Package frogger.model.info

Class Time

  • java.lang.Object
    • frogger.model.info.Time
  • public class Time
extends java.lang.Object

    Time

    A Time is a class for track seconds past in every life in game.

    Since:
    0.2

    • Field Summary

      • Timer

        private javafx.animation.AnimationTimer Timer
        Timer instance of AnimationTimer.

        Set up base at first

        Update secondsLeft every second past then call GameManager.handleTimeUpdate(int)

        public int getSecondsLeft()
        Getter for secondsLeft
        Returns:
        seconds left for game.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Called to stop the timer when game ends.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Reset time for next life of frog but same game

        Reset base and secondsLeft and call GameManager.handleTimeUpdate(int) to update for whole game.

        See Also:
        GameManager.handleTimeUpdate(int)
